verses.verse: Now <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G3854>came<s%> wise <S%G3097>men<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that is <S%G5088>born<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>? <S%G1063>For<s%> we have <S%G1492>seen<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5015>things<s%>, he was troubled, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532>when<s%> he had <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%>, he <S%G4441>demanded<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> would be <S%G1080>born<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>, in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2448>Judah<s%>, <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3760>not<s%> the <S%G1646>least<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2232>princes<s%> of <S%G2448>Judah<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%> shall <S%G1831>come<s%> a <S%G2233>Governor<s%>, <S%G3748>that<s%> shall <S%G4165>rule<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>, when he <S%G2564>had<s%> <S%G2977>privately<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> the wise <S%G3097>men<s%>, <S%G198>inquired<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G198>diligently<s%> what <S%G5550>time<s%> the <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G4198>Go<s%> and <S%G1833>search<s%> <S%G199>diligently<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1875>when<s%> you have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G518>him<s%>, bring <S%G3427>me<s%> word <S%G518>again<s%>, <S%G3704>that<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> may <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2504>also<s%>.

<S%G1161>When<s%> they had <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%>, they <S%G4198>departed<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G792>star<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%>, went <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2193>until<s%> it <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%>.
<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G792>star<s%>, they <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> with <S%G4970>exceedingly<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they had <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%>, they <S%G2147>saw<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> fell <S%G4098>down<s%>, and <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: and <S%G2532>when<s%> they had <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2344>treasures<s%>, they <S%G4374>presented<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%>; <S%G5557>gold<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3030>frankincense<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4666>myrrh<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> being warned by <S%G5537>God<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%> that they <S%G344>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G344>return<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>, they <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G5561%G99999>country<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%>.

And <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> had <S%G402>departed<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1453>Arise<s%>, and <S%G3880>take<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2468>stay<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2193%G99999>until<s%> I <S%G2036>bring<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G2036>word<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>When<s%> he <S%G1453>arose<s%>, he <S%G3880>took<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G5054>death<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod<s%>: <S%G2443>that<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> have I <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>, when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G1702>mocked<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the wise <S%G3097>men<s%>, <S%G2373>was<s%> <S%G3029>exceedingly<s%> <S%G2373>angry<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> sent <S%G649>forth<s%>, and <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3816>sons<s%> that <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> <S%G846>there<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> two years <S%G1332>old<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2736>under<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he had diligently <S%G198>inquired<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the wise <S%G3097>men<s%>.
<S%G5119>Then<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> that which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2408>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G4471>Ramah<s%> was <S%G191>there<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%>, <S%G2355>lamentation<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2805>weeping<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3602>mourning<s%>, <S%G4478>Rachel<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> for <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>sons<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G3870>comforted<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

But <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> was <S%G5053>dead<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, <S%G1453>Arise<s%>, and <S%G3880>take<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they are <S%G2348>dead<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%>'s <S%G5590>life<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G1453>arose<s%>, and <S%G3880>took<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G745>Archelaus<s%> did <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G2449>Judea<s%> in the room <S%G473>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>, he was <S%G5399>afraid<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%>, being warned of <S%G5537>God<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%>, he turned <S%G402>aside<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3313>parts<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2730>lived<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>: <S%G3704>that<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3754>prophets<s%>, He shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> a <S%G3480>Nazarene<s%>.
